mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.customer_id AS "customerId", b.customer_name AS "customerName", b.member_card_id AS "memberCardId", b.member_card_number AS "memberCard", a.attendance_time AS "attendanceTime", a.attendance_type AS "attendanceType", a.reservation_id AS "reservationId", c.reservation_number AS "reservationNumber", a.counselor_id AS "counselorId", d.name AS "counselorName", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.status as "status"
LEFT JOIN crm_customer b on b.id=a.customer_id LEFT JOIN oa_reservation c on c.id=a.reservation_id LEFT JOIN sys_user d on d.id=a.counselor_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_attendance( id, customer_id, attendance_time, attendance_type, reservation_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, counselor_id, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{customerId}, #{attendanceTime}, #{attendanceType}, #{reservationId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{counselorId}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_attendance SET customer_id = #{customerId}, attendance_time = #{attendanceTime}, attendance_type = #{attendanceType}, reservation_id = #{reservationId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, counselor_id = #{counselorId}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
